templates.title: Grav
templates.description: Grav is not your average CMS. It's an open source, flat-file NoDB CMS written for PHP 7.1.3+ that is focused on being crazy fast, easy to learn and use, with powerful features to enable it be easily extended.
templates.note: Volume directory must be changed to separate name for each site.

env.label: PUID
env.name: PUID
env.description: Docker host user ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: PGID
env.name: PGID
env.description: Docker host user group ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: TZ
env.name: Time Zone
env.description: Set the time for the location of the container.

templates.title: Guacamole
templates.name: guacamole
templates.note: The default login will be guacadmin/guacadmin. It is common practice to add a new admin user and remove the default user for Guacamole.

templates.title: ddclient
templates.description: DDClient is a Perl based IP update client for *nix based systems including Linux, FreeBSD and Mac OS X. It supports operating as a daemon as well as optimizes updates for multiple hostnames and aliases. https://ddclient.net
templates.name: ddclient

env.label: PUID
env.name: PUID
env.description: Docker host user ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: PGID
env.name: PGID
env.description: Docker host user group ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: TZ
env.name: Time Zone
env.description: Set the time for the location of the container.

templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager
templates.description: (Alpine) Nginx Proxy Manager enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.
templates.name: nginx-proxy-manager

templates.title: Navidrome
templates.description: Software that allows you to listen to your own digital music in the same way you would with services like Spotify, Apple Music and others.
templates.name: navidrome
templates.note: Check Navidrome site for latest env variable options

env.label: UID
env.name: UID
env.description: Docker host user ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: GID
env.name: GID
env.description: Docker host user group ID. Obtain using 'id username'.

env.label: Scan Interval
env.name: ND_SCANINTERVAL
env.description: How frequently to scan for changes in your music library. Set it to 0 to disable scans.

env.label: Log Level
env.name: ND_LOGLEVEL
env.description: Log level. Useful for troubleshooting. Possible values: error, info, debug, trace.

env.label: Session Timeout
env.name: ND_SESSIONTIMEOUT
env.description: How long Navidrome will wait before closing web ui idle sessions.

env.label: Base URL
env.name: ND_BASEURL
env.description: Base URL (only the path part) to configure Navidrome behind a proxy (ex: /music).

env.label: Transcoding Config
env.name: ND_ENABLETRANSCODINGCONFIG
env.description: Enables transcoding configuration in the UI. Should be disabled after configuration. Check Navidrome security recommendations.
